skillTree.name: Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

skillTree.name: Skeleton Chariot
skillTree.description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.

skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Embalmed in Elixir
skillTree.description: The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Cultist Prince
skillTree.description: The firstborn son of a Tomb King is given to the gods, where he may serve the future itself as part of the Mortuary Cult.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

skillTree.name: Heir of the Chariot King
skillTree.description: The second son of a second son shall succeed his father when the time comes. It is the custom.

skillTree.name: Royal Lieutenant
skillTree.description: The younger sons of a Tomb King command detachments within his armies, ensuring their father's unshakeable, iron will is enacted to the letter.

skillTree.name: Disciple of Khsar
skillTree.description: The Faceless one lurks in the desert watching and ready to strike.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 when fighting in desert terrain
Speed: +10% when in own or allied territory

skillTree.name: Disciple of Phakth
skillTree.description: I am the bringer of justice and truth.

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: Phalanxes
skillTree.description: The undead are constantly on guard, and always vigilant.

skillTree.name: Ancient Caches
skillTree.description: Hidden in the desert, below the shifting sands, are the remnants of ancient barracks, still stocked with Nehekharan supplies.

effects.description: Armour: +1 for all units when defending
Armour: +2 for all units when defending
Armour: +4 for all units when defending

skillTree.name: Infamous Legion
skillTree.description: The tales of this Prince's legion have been spread far and wide. Their banner induces dread in their foes.

skillTree.name: Dutiful Guardian
skillTree.description: For millennia, the Tomb Prince has guarded Nehekhara.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 when in own or friendly territory
Leadership: +2 when in own or allied territory
Melee defence: +4 when in own or friendly territory
Leadership: +4 when in own or allied territory
Melee defence: +8 when in own or friendly territory
Leadership: +8 when in own or allied territory

skillTree.name: Fearless in Death
skillTree.description: They're not running away. Maybe this was a bad idea.

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -1%. Effect is additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Master of Ceremony
skillTree.description: "Revered One, Venerable One, Lord of Secrets, High Priest of the Temple of Yearsâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Trustworthy
skillTree.description: The people of the desert live and die by their oaths in Basth's graceful sight.

skillTree.name: Wise
skillTree.description: Benevolent Tahoth imparts sacred knowledge and timeless wisdom to his people.

skillTree.name: Wrathful
skillTree.description: The Tomb Kings and their servants feel Khsar's wrath coursing through their Unliving veins.

skillTree.name: Eternal
skillTree.description: Time itself cannot harm those who have defied death.

skillTree.name: Chariot Master
skillTree.description: Effective chariot warfare requires precise control - choreography, almost, if you will - if the victories sought by Unliving generals are to be achieved.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: The ties that hold man and beast together cannot be broken by death alone.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Skeletal Horsemen, Nehekhara Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers and Necropolis Knights units

skillTree.name: Infantry Master
skillTree.description: The myriad Undead legions respond to their master's will without question.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen, Skeleton Archers and Tomb Guard units
